item.description:
From the same group that brought World Pillow Fight Day to Boston this spring:

Bostonians beware! A collapse in the timestream is causing a temporal anomaly to converge upon our city! Warriors from throughout time and space are colliding. With water guns.

The finest generals from past and future are recruiting soldiers; register below for your assignment.

Banditos Misteriosos' crack team of physicists and timecops has narrowed down the date of confluence to Saturday, August 21 at 1:30 pm. Location: here, on the Esplanade CLICK HERE.


Uniforms:
If you get assigned to the Past: blacks and grays. We also encourage you to dress as specific warriors from your half of the timeline. For example, musketeers or cavemen.

If you get assigned to the Future: primary colors. We also encourage you to dress as specific warriors from your half of the timeline. For example, cyborgs or alien overlords.

Location:
Please note: Our group will meet up at 1:00PM on the Esplanade CLICK HERE for exact location! Event starts at 1:30PM.

Supplies:
- 1 UNLOADED water gun of your choice.
- At least 3 FILLED two-liter bottles (bring more if you desire!)
- 1 backpack to hold water bottles.
- As always, your fighting vigor and a bandana.

Rules:
Please be aware of electronics during this event. If you see someone with a camera or camcorder, please shy away from getting them wet. Also, we like public property. Lets be nice to it.

Event page: http://www.misterioso...
item.name: Banditos Misteriosos Water Gun Fight 2010
